titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at the anniversary meeting of the sons of clergy-men, in the church of St. Mary Le Bow, on Tuesday, Decem. 3, 1695 printed at the desire of the stewards of the feast, to whom it is humbly presented / by Tho. Whincop ...
titleStmt.author: Whincop, Thomas, d. 1730.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Hodgkin for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
